articles.title: World Braces for Fed Easing Amid 36-Hour Rate Rollercoaster - Bloomberg
articles.description: The world economy’s tectonic plates will shift this week when a US easing cycle begins, just as officials from Europe to Asia set policy against a backdrop of brittle markets.
